name: Depositary and Trustee Association
membership: DATA is a member of the European Trustee and Depositary Forum (ETDF)
goal:
The Depositary and Trustee Association (DATA) was formed in 1999 and represents the industry views of depositaries of open-ended investment companies (OEICs), and Authorised Contractual Schemes (ACS) and trustees of unit trusts within the UK.

Its members act as depositaries and trustees of UK Authorised Funds as well as other types of fund.

Affiliate members

This category of membership is available to depositaries and trustees who act for funds other than UK Authorised Funds.

These include Investment Trusts, Private Equity, Real Estate and Venture Capital Trusts, both EEA and non-EEA domiciled, as well as non-EEA AIFs managed by EU AIFMs. Both DATA Members and DATA Affiliate Members may act for these types of funds.
interests: Borders and Security, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Undertakings for Collective Investment in Transferable. Securities V (UCITS V)
Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive (AIFMD) International central securities depository (ICSD)
The markets in financial instruments directive (MiFID)
